reason: Initialize the arm to the default posture to ensure a good starting configuration for the task.
Move to the pear which is positioned near the target apple and needs to be cleared first.
Lower the arm to working height to engage with the pear for clearing.
Pull the pear toward the robot base to move it away from the target apple.
Lift the arm to a safe height after clearing the pear, preparing for the next clearing action.
Move to the blue_cube which is another obstacle near the target apple that needs to be cleared.
Lower the arm to working height to engage with the blue_cube.
Push the blue_cube to reposition it away from the target apple area.
Lift the arm to a safe height after the push action.
Lower the arm again to continue clearing the blue_cube if it's still in the way.
Push the blue_cube to the right to create more clearance for grasping the apple.
Lift the arm to a safe height after clearing the obstacles, preparing for the grasp attempt.
Reset the hand to the default open posture before attempting to grasp the apple.
Execute the grasp on the target apple now that the surrounding clutter has been cleared.
Lift the arm with the grasped apple to confirm successful pickup.
The target (apple) has been successfully grasped. The task is complete.
